languages.text: {n}Арджента мрачно взирает на вас из-за прядей белых волос. Ее руки на оружии дрожат от нетерпения... но воительница останавливает себя и отворачивается.{/n}
{n}Argenta stares at you grimly from under her locks of white hair. Her hands on her weapon are trembling with impatience... but the warrior stops herself and looks away.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Арджента мрачно взирает на вас из-за прядей белых волос. Ее руки на оружии дрожат от нетерпения... но воительница останавливает себя и отворачивается.{/n}

languages.text: {n}阿洁塔白发之下的目光冷冷地等着你。她握着武器的手不耐烦地颤抖着……但随后，她却克制住了自己，移开了视线。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Argenta stares at you grimly from under her locks of white hair. Her hands on her weapon are trembling with impatience... but the warrior stops herself and looks away.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}阿洁塔白发之下的目光冷冷地等着你。她握着武器的手不耐烦地颤抖着……但随后，她却克制住了自己，移开了视线。{/n}
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: {n}アルジェンタは白髪の下から不愉快そうにあなたを見ている。武器を持つ手は苛立ちから震えている…しかし、周りの戦士に止められ、アルジェンタは目をそらした。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Argenta stares at you grimly from under her locks of white hair. Her hands on her weapon are trembling with impatience... but the warrior stops herself and looks away.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}アルジェンタは白髪の下から不愉快そうにあなたを見ている。武器を持つ手は苛立ちから震えている…しかし、周りの戦士に止められ、アルジェンタは目をそらした。{/n}
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: {n}Argenta te mira fijamente por debajo de sus mechones blancos. Sus manos, sobre el arma, tiemblan de impaciencia... pero la guerrera se detiene y mira hacia otro lado.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Argenta stares at you grimly from under her locks of white hair. Her hands on her weapon are trembling with impatience... but the warrior stops herself and looks away.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Argenta te mira fijamente por debajo de sus mechones blancos. Sus manos, sobre el arma, tiemblan de impaciencia... pero la guerrera se detiene y mira hacia otro lado.{/n}
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: {n}Argenta starrt dich von unter ihren weißen Locken heraus düster an. Die Hände an ihrer Waffe zittern vor Ungeduld ... doch die Kriegerin reißt sich zusammen und blickt weg.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Argenta stares at you grimly from under her locks of white hair. Her hands on her weapon are trembling with impatience... but the warrior stops herself and looks away.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Argenta starrt dich von unter ihren weißen Locken heraus düster an. Die Hände an ihrer Waffe zittern vor Ungeduld ... doch die Kriegerin reißt sich zusammen und blickt weg.{/n}
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: {n}Cachés par ses cheveux blancs, les yeux d'Argenta vous dévisagent d'un air sinistre. Ses mains, posées sur son arme, tremblent d'impatience... mais la guerrière parvient à se maîtriser et détourne le regard.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Argenta stares at you grimly from under her locks of white hair. Her hands on her weapon are trembling with impatience... but the warrior stops herself and looks away.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Cachés par ses cheveux blancs, les yeux d'Argenta vous dévisagent d'un air sinistre. Ses mains, posées sur son arme, tremblent d'impatience... mais la guerrière parvient à se maîtriser et détourne le regard.{/n}
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: {n}Argenta, beyaz saç tutamlarının ardından vahim bakışlarla seni süzüyor. Silahına davranan elleri sabırsızlıktan titrese de kendine hâkim olup yüzünü çeviriyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Argenta stares at you grimly from under her locks of white hair. Her hands on her weapon are trembling with impatience... but the warrior stops herself and looks away.{/n}
